info.name: The Dunes API
info.description:
Complete API collection for The Dunes Backend - Tourism Management System

Base URL: http://localhost:8080

⚠️ IMPORTANT: All endpoints require Authentication!

1. First, login using POST /api/auth/login
2. Copy the accessToken from response
3. Use it in Authorization header: Bearer <token>

Supported Languages: en (default), ar, ru, hi, de, es

Use Accept-Language header to get responses in your preferred language.

**Features:**
- Auto-save token after login
- Automatic token validation
- Comprehensive test scripts
- Full CRUD operations for all resources
- Employee image uploads with form-data
- Employee permissions management
- Operations and Statistics endpoints
- Updated Services list (173 services)
- Complete ServiceAgent seed data for all agents (PEGAS, ABSea/Dubairelax, HOLIDAY MOMENTS, ATSEA TOURS, ANEX TOUR, AL KHALIDIAH TOURISM, Al Sakr / Parus)
- Automatic seed data loading on application startup
- Comprehensive Income/Outcome financial tracking

**Recent Updates:**
- **Financial System**: Income/Outcome calculations based on status:
  - **Income**: Operations (INCOME) + Bookings (COMPLETED only) + Vouchers (COMPLETED only)
  - **Outcome**: Operations (OUTCOME) + Salaries (PAID only) + Commissions (PAID only)
  - **Profit**: Total Income - Total Outcome
- **Booking Updates**:
  - `time` field is auto-generated (represents data recording moment)
  - `pickupTime` format changed to String "HH:mm - HH:mm" (e.g., "03:00 - 03:30")
  - `createAt`, `time`, `pickupTime` returned as String format "yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm" or "HH:mm - HH:mm"
  - `typeOperation` is required (usually "BOOKING")
  - Bookings include services with detailed pricing and agent information
- Employee endpoints now support multipart/form-data for image uploads
- Employee responses include permissions
- Login response no longer includes expiresIn
- Added Operations endpoints (CRUD + Analysis)
- Added Statistics endpoint for dashboard
- Services list updated with 173 services
- Added ServiceAgent endpoints for managing agent-specific services with location-based pricing
- Support for global services (same price everywhere) and location-specific services
- Added endpoints to get all data without pagination (for dropdowns/selects): /api/agents/all, /api/locations/all, /api/services/all, /api/service-agents/all
- Complete seed data added for all agents with real pricing from contracts (automatically loaded on startup)
- All responses now return single message string based on Accept-Language header (not map of all languages)
- Comprehensive error handling for all endpoints
- Fixed seed data loading: Services are not deleted on restart, only new services are added
- ServiceAgents seed data includes logging to track created/skipped items

request.description:
Check if access token is valid and active

**Headers:**
- `Authorization: Bearer {token}` - Required
- `Accept-Language: en|ar|ru|hi|de|es` - Optional (default: en)

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Token is valid and active",
  "data": {
    "isValid": true,
    "isActive": true,
    "employee": {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Owner",
      "email": "owner@thedunes.com",
      "position": "Owner",
      "statusEmployee": "ACTIVE",
      "permissions": {
        "overviewScreen": true,
        "bookingScreen": true,
        "settingScreen": true
      }
    },
    "expiresAt": 1734567890
  }
}
```

**Error Response (401):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Unauthorized access",
  "error": "Invalid or missing token"
}
```

**Error Response (403):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Employee account is inactive",
  "error": "Employee account is inactive"
}
```

**Use Cases:**
- Verify token validity before making API calls
- Check if employee account is still active
- Get current employee information and permissions
- Check token expiration time

Authentication endpoints

request.description:
Get all employees with pagination and profit calculation.

**Query Parameters:**
- `page` (optional): Page number (default: 1)
- `pageSize` (optional): Items per page (default: 10, max: 100)

**Profit Calculation:**
For employees with `isCommission: true`, the response includes a `profit` field:
- **Profit = Total Paid Commission - Total Paid Salary**
- Profit is calculated from:
  - **Total Paid Commission**: Sum of all commissions with status `PAID` for this employee
  - **Total Paid Salary**: Sum of all salaries with status `PAID` for this employee
- When the company owner pays a salary to an employee, it becomes `PAID` and is included in the profit calculation
- Profit shows the net earnings for employees who bring clients (commission-based employees)
- If `isCommission: false`, the `profit` field will be `null`

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Employees retrieved successfully",
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Ahmed Ali",
      "email": "ahmed@thedunes.com",
      "position": "Sales Manager",
      "statusEmployee": "ACTIVE",
      "isCommission": true,
      "isSalary": true,
      "salary": 5000.0,
      "commission": 10,
      "image": "http://localhost:8080/assets/images/employee_abc123.jpg",
      "startVisa": "2024-01-01",
      "endVisa": "2024-12-31",
      "profit": 15000.0,
      "permissions": {
        "overviewScreen": true,
        "analysisScreen": true,
        "bookingScreen": true,
        "showAllBooking": true,
        "addNewBook": true,
        "editBook": true,
        "deleteBook": false
      }
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "Mohamed Hassan",
      "email": "mohamed@thedunes.com",
      "position": "Accountant",
      "statusEmployee": "ACTIVE",
      "isCommission": false,
      "isSalary": true,
      "salary": 4000.0,
      "commission": null,
      "image": "http://localhost:8080/assets/images/employee_def456.jpg",
      "startVisa": "2024-01-01",
      "endVisa": "2024-12-31",
      "profit": null,
      "permissions": {
        "overviewScreen": true,
        "settingScreen": true
      }
    }
  ],
  "pagination": {
    "currentPage": 1,
    "pageSize": 20,
    "totalItems": 2,
    "totalPages": 1,
    "hasNext": false,
    "hasPrevious": false
  }
}
```

**How Profit Works:**
1. When an employee with `isCommission: true` brings a client (creates a receipt voucher), a commission is created with status `PENDING`
2. When the commission is paid (status changes to `PAID`), it is added to the total paid commission
3. When the company owner pays the employee's salary (using POST `/api/salaries/{id}/pay`), the salary status changes to `PAID`
4. Profit = Total Paid Commission - Total Paid Salary
5. This profit represents the net earnings for commission-based employees
6. The profit calculation is done automatically and appears in both `GET /api/employees` and `GET /api/employees/{id}` responses

**Notes:**
- Profit is only calculated for employees with `isCommission: true`
- Profit reflects the actual paid amounts, not pending amounts
- When a salary is paid, it becomes part of the outcome in the system's financial calculations
- The `image` field contains the full URL to access the employee's profile image
- The `permissions` field contains the employee's permission settings

Get a specific employee by ID with profit calculation.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (required): Employee ID

**Profit Calculation:**
For employees with `isCommission: true`, the response includes a `profit` field:
- **Profit = Total Paid Commission - Total Paid Salary**
- Profit is calculated from:
  - **Total Paid Commission**: Sum of all commissions with status `PAID` for this employee
  - **Total Paid Salary**: Sum of all salaries with status `PAID` for this employee
- When the company owner pays a salary to an employee, it becomes `PAID` and is included in the profit calculation
- Profit shows the net earnings for employees who bring clients (commission-based employees)
- If `isCommission: false`, the `profit` field will be `null`

**Success Response (200) - Employee with Commission:**
```json
{

    "id": 1,

      "overviewScreen": true,
      "analysisScreen": true,
      "bookingScreen": true,
      "showAllBooking": true,
      "addNewBook": true,
      "editBook": true,
      "deleteBook": false
    }
  }
}
```

**Success Response (200) - Employee without Commission:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Employee retrieved successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": 2,
    "name": "Mohamed Hassan",
    "email": "mohamed@thedunes.com",
    "position": "Accountant",
    "statusEmployee": "ACTIVE",
    "isCommission": false,
    "isSalary": true,
    "salary": 4000.0,
    "commission": null,
    "image": "http://localhost:8080/assets/images/employee_def456.jpg",
    "startVisa": "2024-01-01",
    "endVisa": "2024-12-31",

      "overviewScreen": true,
      "settingScreen": true
    }
  }
}
```

**How Profit Works:**
1. When an employee with `isCommission: true` brings a client (creates a receipt voucher), a commission is created with status `PENDING`
2. When the commission is paid (status changes to `PAID`), it is added to the total paid commission
3. When the company owner pays the employee's salary (using POST `/api/salaries/{id}/pay`), the salary status changes to `PAID`
4. Profit = Total Paid Commission - Total Paid Salary
5. This profit represents the net earnings for commission-based employees
6. The profit calculation is done automatically and appears in both `GET /api/employees` and `GET /api/employees/{id}` responses

**Notes:**
- The `image` field contains the full URL to access the employee's profile image
- The `permissions` field contains the employee's permission settings
- Profit is only calculated for employees with `isCommission: true`
- Profit reflects the actual paid amounts, not pending amounts
- When a salary is paid, it becomes part of the outcome in the system's financial calculations

formdata.description: Employee profile image (optional). Supported formats: jpg, jpeg, png, gif, webp. Max size: 5MB

request.description:
Create a new employee with optional image upload and permissions

**Request Type:** multipart/form-data

**Required fields:**
- `name`: Employee name
- `email`: Employee email (must be unique)
- `password`: Password (min 6 characters)
- `position`: Employee position
- `isEmarat`: Boolean (true/false)
- `isSalary`: Boolean (true/false)
- `isCommission`: Boolean (true/false)

**Optional fields:**
- `phoneNumber`: Phone number
- `visaCost`: Visa cost (number)
- `salary`: Salary amount (number)
- `commission`: Commission percentage (number)
- `areaOfLocation`: Area of location
- `hotel`: Hotel name
- `startVisa`: Visa start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `endVisa`: Visa end date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `image`: Employee profile image file (jpg, jpeg, png, gif, webp, max 5MB)
- `permissions`: JSON string with permission flags

**Image Upload:**
- Supported formats: jpg, jpeg, png, gif, webp
- Maximum file size: 5MB
- Image will be saved to `assets/images/` folder

**Permissions JSON format:**
```json
{
  "overviewScreen": true,
  "analysisScreen": true,
  "bookingScreen": true,
  "showAllBooking": true,
  "showMyBookAdded": true,
  "addNewBook": true,
  "editBook": true,
  "deleteBook": false,
  "receiptVoucherScreen": true,
  "showAllReceiptVoucher": true,
  "showReceiptVoucherAdded": true,
  "addNewReceiptVoucherMe": true,
  "addNewReceiptVoucherOtherEmployee": false,
  "editReceiptVoucher": true,
  "deleteReceiptVoucher": false,
  "pickupTimeScreen": true,
  "showAllPickup": true,
  "editAnyPickup": false,
  "serviceScreen": true,
  "showAllService": true,
  "addNewService": false,
  "editService": false,
  "deleteService": false,
  "hotelScreen": true,
  "showAllHotels": true,
  "addNewHotels": false,
  "editHotels": false,
  "deleteHotels": false,
  "campScreen": true,
  "showAllCampBookings": true,
  "changeStateBooking": false,
  "operationsScreen": true,
  "showAllOperations": true,
  "addNewOperation": false,
  "editOperation": false,
  "deleteOperation": false,
  "historyScreen": true,
  "showAllHistory": true,
  "settingScreen": false
}
```

**Success Response (201):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": {
    "en": "Employee created successfully"
  },
  "data": {
    "id": 2,
    "name": "Ahmed Ali",
    "email": "ahmed@example.com",
    "position": "Manager",
    "statusEmployee": "ACTIVE",
    "image": "http://localhost:8080/assets/images/employee_abc123.jpg",
    "permissions": {
      "overviewScreen": true,
      "analysisScreen": true,
      "bookingScreen": true,
      "showAllBooking": true,
      "addNewBook": true
    }
  }
}
```

**Note:** The `image` field in the response contains the full URL to access the uploaded image. You can use this URL directly in your frontend to display the image.

**Error Response (409):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": {
    "en": "Email already exists"
  }
}
```

**Note:** This endpoint also supports JSON requests for backward compatibility.

request.description:
Update an employee with optional image upload and permissions

**Request Type:** multipart/form-data

**All fields are optional:**
- `name`: Employee name
- `email`: Employee email (must be unique if changed)
- `password`: Password (min 6 characters)
- `position`: Employee position
- `phoneNumber`: Phone number
- `isEmarat`: Boolean (true/false)
- `visaCost`: Visa cost (number)
- `isSalary`: Boolean (true/false)
- `isCommission`: Boolean (true/false)
- `salary`: Salary amount (number)
- `commission`: Commission percentage (number)
- `areaOfLocation`: Area of location
- `hotel`: Hotel name
- `statusEmployee`: ACTIVE, INACTIVE, SUSPENDED
- `lastStatusSalary`: Boolean (true/false)
- `startVisa`: Visa start date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `endVisa`: Visa end date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `image`: Employee profile image file (jpg, jpeg, png, gif, webp, max 5MB)
- `permissions`: JSON string with permission flags

**Image Upload:**
- Supported formats: jpg, jpeg, png, gif, webp
- Maximum file size: 5MB
- If a new image is uploaded, the old image will be automatically deleted
- Image will be saved to `assets/images/` folder

**Permissions JSON format:**
```json
{
  "overviewScreen": true,
  "analysisScreen": true,
  "bookingScreen": true,
  "showAllBooking": true,
  "addNewBook": true,
  "editBook": true,
  "deleteBook": false
}
```

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": {
    "ar": "تم تحديث الموظف بنجاح"
  },
  "data": {
    "id": 2,
    "name": "Ahmed Ali Updated",
    "position": "Senior Manager",
    "image": "http://localhost:8080/assets/images/employee_abc123.jpg",
    "permissions": {
      "overviewScreen": true,
      "analysisScreen": true,
      "bookingScreen": true
    }
  }
}
```

**Note:** The `image` field in the response contains the full URL to access the uploaded image. The `permissions` field contains the updated permission settings. This endpoint also supports JSON requests for backward compatibility.

item.name: Salaries

query.description: Filter by status (optional). Values: PENDING, OVERDUE, PAID
Filter by month (optional). Format: Month name (e.g., November, October)

request.description:
Get all salaries with pagination and filtering options.

**Query Parameters:**
- `page` (optional): Page number (default: 1)
- `pageSize` (optional): Items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
- `employeeId` (optional): Filter by employee ID
- `status` (optional): Filter by status - Values: `PENDING`, `OVERDUE`, `PAID`
- `year` (optional): Filter by year (format: YYYY, e.g., "2025")
- `month` (optional): Filter by month (format: Month name, e.g., "November", "October")

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Salaries retrieved successfully",
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "employeeId": 1,
      "employeeName": "Saad Mohamed",
      "year": "2025",
      "month": "November",
      "salary": 6000.0,
      "statusPaid": "PENDING",
      "typeOperation": "OUTCOME"
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "employeeId": 1,
      "employeeName": "Saad Mohamed",
      "year": "2025",
      "month": "October",
      "salary": 6000.0,
      "statusPaid": "OVERDUE",
      "typeOperation": "OUTCOME"
    },
    {
      "id": 3,
      "employeeId": 1,
      "employeeName": "Saad Mohamed",
      "year": "2025",
      "month": "September",
      "salary": 6000.0,
      "statusPaid": "PAID",
      "typeOperation": "OUTCOME"
    }
  ],
  "pagination": {
    "currentPage": 1,
    "pageSize": 20,
    "totalItems": 3,
    "totalPages": 1
  }
}
```

**Notes:**
- Salaries are automatically created with `typeOperation = OUTCOME`
- Status can be `PENDING`, `OVERDUE`, or `PAID`
- When a salary is paid, an OUTCOME operation is automatically created

request.description:
Get all pending salaries for a specific employee.

**Path Parameters:**

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Salaries retrieved successfully",
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "employeeId": 1,
      "employeeName": "Saad Mohamed",
      "year": "2025",
      "month": "November",
      "salary": 6000.0,
      "statusPaid": "PENDING",

    }
```

- Used to show unpaid salaries for an employee

Create a new salary record for an employee.

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "employeeId": 1,
  "year": "2025",
  "month": "November",
  "salary": 6000.0
}
```

**Required Fields:**
- `employeeId` (required): Employee ID
- `year` (required): Year (format: YYYY, e.g., "2025")
- `month` (required): Month name (e.g., "November", "October", "September")
- `salary` (required): Salary amount (must be greater than 0)

**Success Response (201 Created):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Salary created successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "employeeId": 1,
    "employeeName": "Saad Mohamed",
    "year": "2025",
    "month": "November",
    "salary": 6000.0,
    "statusPaid": "PENDING",
    "typeOperation": "OUTCOME"
  }
}
```

**Error Response (400 Bad Request - Invalid Salary):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Salary must be greater than 0",
  "error": "Salary must be greater than 0"
}
```

**Error Response (400 Bad Request - Empty Year/Month):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Year cannot be empty",
  "error": "Year cannot be empty"
}
```

**Notes:**
- Salary is automatically created with `statusPaid = PENDING`
- `typeOperation` is automatically set to `OUTCOME`
- When the salary is paid (using POST /api/salaries/{id}/pay), an OUTCOME operation is automatically created

Update a salary record by ID. All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (required): Salary ID

**Request Body (All fields are optional):**
```json
{
  "year": "2025",
  "month": "December",
  "salary": 7000.0
}
```

**Optional Fields:**
- `year` (optional): Year (format: YYYY, e.g., "2025")
- `month` (optional): Month name (e.g., "November", "October")
- `salary` (optional): Salary amount (must be greater than 0 if provided)

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Salary updated successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "employeeId": 1,
    "employeeName": "Saad Mohamed",
    "year": "2025",
    "month": "December",
    "salary": 7000.0,
    "statusPaid": "PENDING",
    "typeOperation": "OUTCOME"
  }
}
```

**Error Response (404 Not Found):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Salary not found",
```

**Notes:**
- Only provided fields will be updated, others remain unchanged
- Status and typeOperation cannot be updated through this endpoint
- To pay a salary, use POST /api/salaries/{id}/pay

Pay a salary (mark as PAID and create OUTCOME operation).

**What This Endpoint Does:**

   - `employeeId`: Employee ID
   - `createAt`: Current timestamp

**Success Response (200):**

```json
    "employeeId": 1,
```

```json
  "success": false,

  "error": "Salary is already paid"
}
```

**Error Response (404 Not Found):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Salary not found",
  "error": "Salary not found"
}
```

**Notes:**
- This endpoint automatically creates an OUTCOME operation in the Operations table
- The operation title includes employee name, month, and year for easy identification
- The operation amount equals the salary amount
- This operation will be included in financial calculations (Income/Outcome analysis)
- If operation creation fails, the salary payment still succeeds (error is logged but not returned)

**Optional Fields:**

request.description:
Get all bookings with pagination, filtering, and statistics

**Query Parameters:**
- `page`: Page number (default: 1)
- `pageSize`: Number of items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
- `employeeId`: Filter by employee ID (optional)
- `guestName`: Filter by guest name - partial match (optional)
- `statusBook`: Filter by booking status (optional). Values: PENDING, ACCEPTED, COMPLETED, CANCELLED
- `pickupStatus`: Filter by pickup status (optional). Values: YET, PICKED, INWAY
- `timeStart`: Filter by booking time start date (optional). Format: "yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm" - Example: "2025/11/22 08:00"
- `timeEnd`: Filter by booking time end date (optional). Format: "yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm" - Example: "2025/11/22 23:59"
- `agentId`: Filter by agent ID (optional)

**Notes:**
- Results are ordered by creation date (newest first - last added appears first)
- All filters are optional and can be combined
- Date filters use the `time` field (booking time, not creation time)
- Response includes statistics: `totalPrice` (sum of all filtered bookings' finalPrice) and `totalCount` (total count of filtered bookings)
- If no filters are applied, statistics are calculated for ALL bookings
- If filters are applied, statistics are calculated only for filtered bookings

Export bookings to Excel file for a specific agent and date range

**Query Parameters (All Required):**
- `agentId`: Agent ID (required)
- `startDate`: Start date (required). Format: "yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm" - Example: "2025/11/01 00:00"
- `endDate`: End date (required). Format: "yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm" - Example: "2025/11/30 23:59"

**Response:**
- Returns an Excel file (.xlsx) with the following columns:
  - Booking ID
  - Date
  - Guest Name
  - Phone
  - Hotel
  - Room
  - Service Name
  - Adults
  - Children
  - Kids
  - Service Price
  - Total Price
  - Status
  - Payment

**Notes:**
- Each booking service is shown in a separate row
- If a booking has multiple services, it will appear multiple times (once per service)
- The file name format: `Bookings_{AgentName}_{StartDate}_{EndDate}.xlsx`
- Date range uses the booking `time` field (not creation time)
- Only bookings within the specified date range and for the specified agent are included

**Example Request:**
```
GET /api/bookings/export/excel?agentId=1&startDate=2025/11/01 00:00&endDate=2025/11/30 23:59
```

**Success Response (200):**
- Content-Type: `application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.spreadsheetml.sheet`
- Content-Disposition: `attachment; filename="Bookings_ANEX_TOUR_20251101_20251130.xlsx"`
- Body: Excel file binary data

Create a new booking with services

**Required Fields:**
- `guestName`: Guest name (required)
- `typeOperation`: Operation type - usually "BOOKING" (required)
- `services`: List of services (required, at least one service)
- `priceBeforePercentage`: Price before discount (required)
- `priceAfterPercentage`: Price after discount (required)
- `finalPrice`: Final price (required)

**Optional Fields:**
- `time`: Booking time as String (Format: "yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm") - Auto-generated if not provided
- `pickupTime`: Pickup time range as String (Format: "HH:mm - HH:mm") - Example: "03:00 - 03:30"
- `phoneNumber`: Phone number
- `statusBook`: Booking status (default: "PENDING") - Values: PENDING, ACCEPTED, COMPLETED, CANCELLED
- `employeeId`: Employee ID
- `agentName`: Agent ID (Long)
- `locationId`: Location ID for pricing
- `hotelName`: Hotel name
- `room`: Room number
- `note`: Notes
- `driver`: Driver name
- `carNumber`: Car number
- `voucher`: Voucher number
- `orderNumber`: Order number
- `payment`: Payment method (default: "PENDING") - Values: CASH, CARD, PENDING
- `pickupStatus`: Pickup status - Values: YET, PICKED, INWAY

**Services Array:**
Each service in `services` array contains:
- `serviceId`: Service ID (required)
- `locationId`: Location ID for location-specific pricing (optional, null = global price)
- `adultNumber`: Number of adults (default: 0)
- `childNumber`: Number of children (default: 0)
- `kidNumber`: Number of kids (default: 0)

**Important Notes:**
1. `time` is auto-generated if not provided (represents the moment when data is recorded)
2. `pickupTime` is a String with format "HH:mm - HH:mm" (time range)
3. `createAt` is auto-generated and returned as String format "yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm"
4. Prices are automatically calculated from ServiceAgent based on agentName, locationId, and serviceId
5. Only COMPLETED bookings are counted as Income

**Success Response (201):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Booking created successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": 7,
    "createAt": "2025/11/22 08:11",
    "time": "2025/11/22 08:11",
    "voucher": "VOUCHER123",
    "orderNumber": "ORD123456",
    "pickupTime": "03:00 - 03:30",
    "pickupStatus": "YET",
    "employeeId": 1,
    "guestName": "أحمد محمد",
    "phoneNumber": "+971501234567",
    "statusBook": "PENDING",
    "agentId": 1,
    "agentName": "PEGAS",
    "locationId": 1,
    "locationName": "Ras Al Khaimah",
    "hotelName": "فندق جراند",
    "room": 101,
    "note": "ملاحظات خاصة",
    "driver": "محمد علي",
    "carNumber": 1234,
    "payment": "CASH",
    "typeOperation": "BOOKING",
    "services": [
      {
        "id": 10,
        "serviceId": 805,
        "serviceName": "60 Minutes QUAD BIKE ONLY",
        "locationId": 1,
        "locationName": "Ras Al Khaimah",
        "adultNumber": 2,
        "childNumber": 1,
        "kidNumber": 0,
        "adultPrice": 225.0,
        "childPrice": 190.0,
        "kidPrice": 0.0,
        "totalPriceService": 640.0
      }
    ],
    "priceBeforePercentage": 1000.0,
    "priceAfterPercentage": 900.0,
    "finalPrice": 900.0
  }
}
```

Create multiple bookings in a single request

**Request Body:**
- `bookings`: Array of booking objects (required, cannot be empty)

Each booking object follows the same structure as Create Booking endpoint:

**Required Fields for each booking:**
- `guestName`: Guest name (required)
- `typeOperation`: Operation type - usually "BOOKING" (required)
- `services`: List of services (required, at least one service)
- `priceBeforePercentage`: Price before discount (required)
- `priceAfterPercentage`: Price after discount (required)
- `finalPrice`: Final price (required)

**Optional Fields for each booking:**
- `time`: Booking time as String (Format: "yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm") - Auto-generated if not provided
- `pickupTime`: Pickup time range as String (Format: "HH:mm - HH:mm") - Example: "03:00 - 03:30"
- `phoneNumber`: Phone number
- `statusBook`: Booking status (default: "PENDING") - Values: PENDING, ACCEPTED, COMPLETED, CANCELLED
- `employeeId`: Employee ID
- `agentName`: Agent ID (Long)
- `locationId`: Location ID for pricing
- `hotelName`: Hotel name
- `room`: Room number
- `note`: Notes
- `driver`: Driver name
- `carNumber`: Car number
- `voucher`: Voucher number
- `orderNumber`: Order number
- `payment`: Payment method (default: "PENDING") - Values: CASH, CARD, PENDING
- `pickupStatus`: Pickup status - Values: YET, PICKED, INWAY

**Important Notes:**
1. Each booking is processed independently - if one fails, others will still be processed
2. The response includes information about successful and failed bookings
3. All bookings share the same `createAt` timestamp (time of request)
4. Each booking can have different services, prices, and details

**Success Response (201 - All bookings created):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Booking created successfully",
  "data": {
    "created": [
      {
        "id": 1,
        "guestName": "John Doe",
        "locationId": 1,
        "locationName": "Ras Al Khaimah",
        ...
      },
      {
        "id": 2,
        "guestName": "Jane Smith",
        "locationId": null,
        "locationName": null,
        ...
      }
    ],
    "totalRequested": 2,
    "totalCreated": 2,
    "totalFailed": 0,
    "errors": []
  }
}
```

**Partial Success Response (207 - Some bookings failed):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Created 1 of 2 bookings. Some bookings failed.",
  "data": {
    "created": [
      {
        "id": 1,
        "guestName": "John Doe",
        "locationId": 1,
        "locationName": "Ras Al Khaimah",
        ...
      }
    ],
    "totalRequested": 2,
    "totalCreated": 1,
    "totalFailed": 1,
    "errors": [
      "Booking 2: Service with ID 999 not found"
    ]
  }
}
```

**Error Response (400 - All bookings failed or empty list):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Failed to create booking",
  "error": "Bookings list cannot be empty"
}
```

Update a booking by ID

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (required): Booking ID

**Request Body (All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated):**
- `time`: Booking time as String (Format: "yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm")
- `voucher`: Voucher number
- `orderNumber`: Order number
- `pickupTime`: Pickup time range as String (Format: "HH:mm - HH:mm") - Example: "03:00 - 03:30"
- `pickupStatus`: Pickup status - Values: YET, PICKED, INWAY
- `employeeId`: Employee ID
- `guestName`: Guest name
- `phoneNumber`: Phone number
- `statusBook`: Booking status - Values: PENDING, ACCEPTED, COMPLETED, CANCELLED
- `agentName`: Agent ID (Long)
- `locationId`: Location ID for pricing
- `currencyId`: Currency ID (if provided, prices will be converted to AED)
- `hotelName`: Hotel name
- `room`: Room number
- `note`: Notes
- `driver`: Driver name
- `carNumber`: Car number
- `payment`: Payment method - Values: CASH, CARD, PENDING
- `typeOperation`: Operation type - usually "BOOKING"
- `services`: List of services (optional - if provided, will replace all existing services)
  - Each service object contains:
    - `serviceId`: Service ID (required)
    - `locationId`: Location ID for location-specific pricing (optional)
    - `adultNumber`: Number of adults (default: 0)
    - `childNumber`: Number of children (default: 0)
    - `kidNumber`: Number of kids (default: 0)
- `priceBeforePercentage`: Price before discount (if provided with currencyId, will be converted to AED)
- `priceAfterPercentage`: Price after discount (if provided with currencyId, will be converted to AED)
- `finalPrice`: Final price (if provided with currencyId, will be converted to AED)

**Important Notes:**
1. All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated
2. If `services` is provided, all existing services will be deleted and replaced with the new services
3. Service prices are automatically calculated from ServiceAgent based on `agentName`, `locationId`, and `serviceId`
4. If `currencyId` is provided or any price field is updated, all prices will be converted to AED before saving
5. Prices are always stored in AED in the database
6. The original `currencyId` is stored for reference
7. When retrieving, prices are returned as stored (in AED)

**🚗 Auto-Sync with Vehicle Groups:**
- **If the booking has a `pickupGroupId` and you change `carNumber` or `driver`:**
  - ALL bookings and vouchers in the same group will be automatically updated with the new values
  - This ensures consistency across all items assigned to the same vehicle
  - The `pickupGroupId` is preserved during update (not changed)

**Example:**
If booking #132 is in group "abc-123" with bookings #555 and voucher #666:
- Updating booking #132's `carNumber` from 1 to 2 → automatically updates bookings #555 and voucher #666's `carNumber` to 2
- Updating booking #132's `driver` from "محمد" to "أحمد" → automatically updates bookings #555 and voucher #666's `driver` to "أحمد"
- This works from both the bookings page and pickup page

**Permission Required:**
- `editBook` permission

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Booking updated successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": 7,
    "createAt": "2025/11/22 08:11",
    "time": "2025/11/22 08:11",
    "voucher": "VOUCHER123",
    "orderNumber": "ORD123456",
    "pickupTime": "03:00 - 03:30",
    "pickupStatus": "YET",
    "employeeId": 1,
    "guestName": "أحمد محمد",
    "phoneNumber": "+971501234567",
    "statusBook": "PENDING",
    "agentId": 1,
    "agentName": "AVEX TOUR",
    "currencyId": 1,
    "locationId": 1,
    "locationName": "Ras Al Khaimah",
    "hotelName": "فندق جراند",
    "room": 101,
    "note": "ملاحظات خاصة",
    "driver": "محمد علي",
    "carNumber": 1234,
    "payment": "CASH",
    "typeOperation": "BOOKING",
    "services": [
      {
        "id": 10,
        "serviceId": 805,
        "serviceName": "60 Minutes QUAD BIKE ONLY",
        "locationId": 1,
        "locationName": "Ras Al Khaimah",
        "adultNumber": 2,
        "childNumber": 1,
        "kidNumber": 0,
        "adultPrice": 225.0,
        "childPrice": 190.0,
        "kidPrice": 0.0,
        "totalPriceService": 640.0
      },
      {
        "id": 11,
        "serviceId": 806,
        "serviceName": "60 Minutes QUAD BIKE WITH DINNER",
        "locationId": null,
        "locationName": null,
        "adultNumber": 1,
        "childNumber": 0,
        "kidNumber": 0,
        "adultPrice": 286.0,
        "childPrice": 247.5,
        "kidPrice": 0.0,
        "totalPriceService": 286.0
      }
    ],
    "priceBeforePercentage": 1000.0,
    "priceAfterPercentage": 900.0,
    "finalPrice": 900.0,
    "totalPrice": 900.0
  }
}
```

**Error Response (400 - Invalid service):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Failed to update booking",
  "error": "Service with ID 999 not found"
}
```

**Error Response (404):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Booking not found",
  "error": "Booking not found"
}
```

Update booking status by ID.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (required): Booking ID

**Query Parameters:**
- `status` (required): New booking status
  - Values: `PENDING`, `ACCEPTED`, `COMPLETED`, `CANCELLED`

**Permission Required:**
- `editBook` permission

**🔄 Integration with Pickup-Time:**
- When status changes to `ACCEPTED` or `PENDING`, the booking will automatically appear in `/api/pickup-times` endpoint
- When status changes to `COMPLETED` or `CANCELLED`, the booking is automatically removed from pickup page
- You can change booking status from any screen, and it will be reflected in the pickup-time endpoint

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Booking updated successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": 7,
    "createAt": "2025/11/22 08:11",
    "time": "2025/11/22 08:11",
    "statusBook": "ACCEPTED",
    "guestName": "أحمد محمد",
    "services": [],
    "finalPrice": 900.0
  }
}
```

**Error Response (400 Bad Request - Missing Status):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Status is required",
  "error": "Status is required"
}
```

**Error Response (400 Bad Request - Invalid Status):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Invalid status",
  "error": "Invalid status"
}
```

**Error Response (404 Not Found):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Booking not found",
  "error": "Booking not found"
}
```

**Error Response (403 Forbidden - Permission Denied):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Permission denied",
  "error": "You don't have permission to update booking status. Edit book permission required."
}
```

**Notes:**
- Only bookings with `editBook` permission can be updated
- Status values are case-insensitive (will be converted to uppercase)
- When status changes to `ACCEPTED` or `PENDING`, the booking will appear in pickup-time endpoint
- When status changes to `COMPLETED` or `CANCELLED`, the booking is automatically removed from pickup page
- Response includes basic booking information (services are not included in this response)
- You can change booking status from any screen, and it will be reflected in the pickup-time endpoint

Update booking pickup status by ID.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (required): Booking ID

**Query Parameters:**
- `status` (required): New pickup status
  - Values: `YET` (not picked yet), `PICKED` (picked up), `INWAY` (in way)

**Permission Required:**
- `editBook` permission

**🔄 Integration with Pickup-Time:**
- When pickup status changes, the booking will be updated in `/api/pickup-times` endpoint
- Pickup status changes are reflected immediately in the pickup-time endpoint
- You can change pickup status from any screen, and it will be reflected in the pickup-time endpoint

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Booking updated successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": 7,
    "createAt": "2025/11/22 08:11",
    "time": "2025/11/22 08:11",
    "pickupStatus": "PICKED",
    "guestName": "أحمد محمد",
    "services": [],
    "finalPrice": 900.0
  }
}
```

**Error Response (400 Bad Request - Missing Status):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Status is required",
  "error": "Status is required"
}
```

**Error Response (400 Bad Request - Invalid Status):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Invalid status",
  "error": "Invalid status"
}
```

**Error Response (404 Not Found):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Booking not found",
  "error": "Booking not found"
}
```

**Error Response (403 Forbidden - Permission Denied):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Permission denied",
  "error": "You don't have permission to update pickup status. Edit book permission required."
}
```

**Notes:**
- Only bookings with `editBook` permission can be updated
- Pickup status values are case-insensitive (will be converted to uppercase)
- `YET`: Booking has not been picked up yet
- `PICKED`: Booking has been picked up from the hotel/location
- `INWAY`: Booking is in way to destination
- When pickup status changes, the booking will be updated in pickup-time endpoint
- Response includes basic booking information (services are not included in this response)
- You can change pickup status from any screen, and it will be reflected in the pickup-time endpoint

Delete a booking by ID (soft delete)

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (required): Booking ID

**Permission Required:**
- `deleteBook` permission

**Success Response (204):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Booking deleted successfully"
}
```

**Error Response (404):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Booking not found",
  "error": "Booking not found"
}
```

Delete all bookings (soft delete)

⚠️ **WARNING:** This will delete ALL bookings in the system!

**Permission Required:**
- `deleteBook` permission

**What gets deleted:**
- All bookings (soft delete - sets deletedAt timestamp)
- All ServiceOperationBookings associated with the bookings

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "All bookings deleted successfully",
  "data": {
    "deletedCount": 12,
    "message": "All bookings deleted successfully"
  }
}
```

**Note:**
- After deletion, new bookings will start from ID 1 (auto-increment resets)
- This is a soft delete, so data is not permanently removed
- Use this endpoint to reset all bookings for testing purposes

item.name: Receipt Vouchers

request.description:
Get all receipt vouchers with pagination, filtering options, and statistics.

**Query Parameters:**
- `page` (optional): Page number (default: 1)
- `pageSize` (optional): Items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
- `employeeId` (optional): Filter by employee ID who created the voucher
- `guestName` (optional): Filter by guest name (partial match)
- `status` (optional): Filter by status - Values: `PENDING`, `ACCEPTED`, `COMPLETED`, `CANCELLED`
- `pickupStatus` (optional): Filter by pickup status - Values: `YET`, `PICKED`, `DELIVERED`
- `timeStart` (optional): Filter by start date/time (format: `yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm`)
- `timeEnd` (optional): Filter by end date/time (format: `yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm`)

**Permission-Based Data Access:**
- **`showAllReceiptVoucher`**: Can view all vouchers (can filter by `employeeId` query parameter)
- **`showReceiptVoucherAdded`**: Can only view vouchers they created (automatically filtered to current employee)
- **`receiptVoucherScreen`**: Basic screen access (defaults to viewing own vouchers if no specific viewing permission)

**Statistics:**
The response includes a `statistics` object that provides counts for each status:
- `total`: Total number of vouchers (based on permissions and filters)
- `completed`: Number of vouchers with COMPLETED status
- `pending`: Number of vouchers with PENDING status
- `accepted`: Number of vouchers with ACCEPTED status
- `cancelled`: Number of vouchers with CANCELLED status

**Important:** Statistics are calculated based on:
- Employee permissions (all vouchers vs. own vouchers only)
- Applied filters (employeeId, guestName, pickupStatus, timeStart, timeEnd)
- **Note:** The `status` filter does NOT affect statistics - statistics always show counts for ALL statuses regardless of the `status` query parameter

**Example Request:**
```
GET /api/receipt-vouchers?page=1&pageSize=20&status=ACCEPTED&guestName=John&timeStart=2025/12/01 00:00&timeEnd=2025/12/31 23:59
```

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Receipt vouchers retrieved successfully",
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "createAt": "2025/12/05 19:15:00",
      "guestName": "John Doe",
      "location": "Dubai",
      "locationId": 1,
      "currencyId": 1,
      "phoneNumber": "+971501234567",
      "status": "ACCEPTED",
      "hotel": "Grand Hotel",
      "room": 101,
      "note": "Special request",
      "pickupTime": "03:00 - 03:30",
      "pickupStatus": "YET",
      "driver": "محمد علي",
      "carNumber": 1,
      "payment": "CASH",
      "employeeAddedId": 1,
      "commissionEmployee": 100.0,
      "typeOperation": "SERVICE",
      "employeeIsReceivedCommission": false,
      "discountPercentage": 10,
      "services": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "serviceId": 1,
          "serviceName": "60 Minutes QUAD BIKE ONLY",
          "adultNumber": 2,
          "childNumber": 1,
          "kidNumber": 0,
          "adultPrice": 200.0,
          "childPrice": 150.0,
          "kidPrice": 100.0,
          "totalPrice": 550.0
        }
      ],
      "priceBeforePercentage": 1000.0,
      "priceAfterPercentage": 900.0,
      "finalPriceWithCommissionEmployee": 1000.0,
      "finalPriceAfterDeductingCommissionEmployee": 900.0
    }
  ],
  "pagination": {
    "currentPage": 1,
    "pageSize": 20,
    "totalItems": 50,
    "totalPages": 3,
    "hasNext": true,
    "hasPrevious": false
  },
  "statistics": {
    "total": 50,
    "completed": 25,
    "pending": 15,
    "accepted": 8,
    "cancelled": 2,
    "totalPriceCompleted": 125000.0,
    "totalPricePending": 45000.0,
    "totalPriceAccepted": 32000.0,
    "totalPriceCancelled": 5000.0,
    "totalPrice": 207000.0
  }
}
```

**Success Response (200) - Employee with showReceiptVoucherAdded permission:**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Receipt vouchers retrieved successfully",
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "createAt": "2025/12/05 19:15:00",
      "guestName": "John Doe",
      "status": "ACCEPTED",
      "employeeAddedId": 5,
      "finalPriceAfterDeductingCommissionEmployee": 900.0
    }
  ],
  "pagination": {
    "currentPage": 1,
    "pageSize": 20,
    "totalItems": 10,
    "totalPages": 1,
    "hasNext": false,
    "hasPrevious": false
  },
  "statistics": {
    "total": 10,
    "completed": 5,
    "pending": 3,
    "accepted": 2,
    "cancelled": 0,
    "totalPriceCompleted": null,
    "totalPricePending": null,
    "totalPriceAccepted": null,
    "totalPriceCancelled": null,
    "totalPrice": null,
    "profit": 15000.0,
    "pendingProfit": 5000.0,
    "paidCommissions": 20000.0
  }
}
```

**Statistics Fields Explained:**

**For users with `showAllReceiptVoucher` permission:**
- `totalPriceCompleted`: Total price (finalPriceAfterDeductingCommissionEmployee) for all COMPLETED vouchers
- `totalPricePending`: Total price for all PENDING vouchers
- `totalPriceAccepted`: Total price for all ACCEPTED vouchers
- `totalPriceCancelled`: Total price for all CANCELLED vouchers
- `totalPrice`: Sum of all prices across all statuses
- `profit`, `pendingProfit`, `paidCommissions`: `null` (not applicable)

**For employees with `showReceiptVoucherAdded` permission only:**
- `profit`: Net profit = Total Paid Commission - Total Paid Salary
- `pendingProfit`: Total Pending Commission (commissions not yet paid)
- `paidCommissions`: Total Paid Commission (commissions already received)
- `totalPriceCompleted`, `totalPricePending`, etc.: `null` (not applicable)
- Number of operations in each status: `completed`, `pending`, `accepted`, `cancelled` (count of vouchers created by this employee)

**Usage Examples:**

1. **View all vouchers (requires `showAllReceiptVoucher` permission):**
   ```
   GET /api/receipt-vouchers?page=1&pageSize=20
   ```
   Statistics show counts for ALL vouchers in the system.

2. **View vouchers for specific employee (requires `showAllReceiptVoucher` permission):**
   ```
   GET /api/receipt-vouchers?employeeId=5&page=1&pageSize=20
   ```
   Statistics show counts for vouchers created by employee ID 5.

3. **View own vouchers only (requires `showReceiptVoucherAdded` permission):**
   ```
   GET /api/receipt-vouchers?page=1&pageSize=20
   ```
   Statistics show counts for vouchers created by the current employee (automatically filtered).

4. **Filter by date range and analyze:**
   ```
   GET /api/receipt-vouchers?timeStart=2025/12/01 00:00&timeEnd=2025/12/31 23:59&page=1&pageSize=20
   ```
   Statistics show counts for vouchers created within the specified date range.

5. **Filter by guest name and analyze:**
   ```
   GET /api/receipt-vouchers?guestName=John&page=1&pageSize=20
   ```
   Statistics show counts for vouchers matching the guest name filter.

**Notes:**
- All date/time fields are returned in format: `yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm`
- `pickupTime` is returned as plain text string (not timestamp)
- Services array includes all service details with prices
- Filtering by `timeStart` and `timeEnd` searches by voucher creation date
- Statistics are calculated based on permissions and all filters EXCEPT the `status` filter
- The `status` filter only affects which vouchers are returned in the `data` array, not the statistics
- Statistics help analyze voucher distribution across different statuses for reporting and dashboard purposes

**Profit Calculation for Employees:**
- `profit`: Shows net earnings (Total Paid Commission - Total Paid Salary)
- `pendingProfit`: Shows commissions that are pending payment
- `paidCommissions`: Shows total commissions already received
- These values help employees track their earnings and understand their financial status
- Profit is calculated from actual paid amounts, not pending amounts
- When a commission is paid (status changes to PAID), it is added to `paidCommissions`
- When a salary is paid (status changes to PAID), it is deducted from profit calculation

Get a specific receipt voucher by ID with all its details and services.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (required): Receipt Voucher ID

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": {
    "en": "Receipt voucher retrieved successfully",
    "ar": "تم جلب سند القبض بنجاح"
  },
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "createAt": "2025/12/05 19:15:00",
    "guestName": "John Doe",
    "location": "Dubai",
    "locationId": 1,
    "currencyId": 1,
    "phoneNumber": "+971501234567",
    "status": "ACCEPTED",
    "hotel": "Grand Hotel",
    "room": 101,
    "note": "Special request",
    "pickupTime": "03:00 - 03:30",
    "pickupStatus": "YET",
    "driver": "محمد علي",
    "carNumber": 1,
    "payment": "CASH",
    "employeeAddedId": 1,
    "commissionEmployee": 100.0,
    "typeOperation": "SERVICE",
    "employeeIsReceivedCommission": false,
    "discountPercentage": 10,
    "services": [
      {
        "id": 1,
        "serviceId": 1,
        "serviceName": "60 Minutes QUAD BIKE ONLY",
        "adultNumber": 2,
        "childNumber": 1,
        "kidNumber": 0,
        "adultPrice": 200.0,
        "childPrice": 150.0,
        "kidPrice": 100.0,
        "totalPrice": 550.0
      }
    ],
    "priceBeforePercentage": 1000.0,
    "priceAfterPercentage": 900.0,
    "finalPriceWithCommissionEmployee": 1000.0,
    "finalPriceAfterDeductingCommissionEmployee": 900.0,
    "commissionId": 1,
    "commissionStatus": "PENDING",
    "commissionAmount": 100.0
  }
}
```

**Commission Information:**
The response includes commission details if a commission was created for this voucher:
- `commissionId`: ID of the commission record in `employee_commissions` table
- `commissionStatus`: Status of the commission - `PENDING`, `PAID`, or `CANCELLED`
- `commissionAmount`: Commission amount (same as `commissionEmployee`)
- These fields are `null` if no commission was created for this voucher
- Commission is automatically created when voucher is created (if employee has commission enabled)
- Employees can track their commission status through these fields
- When commission is paid (using `POST /api/commissions/{id}/pay`), `commissionStatus` changes to `PAID`

**Error Response (404 Not Found):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": {
    "en": "Receipt voucher not found",
    "ar": "سند القبض غير موجود"
  },
  "error": "Receipt voucher not found"
}
```

**Notes:**
- Returns complete voucher details including all services
- `createAt` is formatted as `yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm`
- `pickupTime` is returned as plain text string
- Commission information is included for employees who created the voucher
- Employees can see their commission status and track payment

Generate and download a PDF receipt voucher for a specific voucher ID.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (required): Receipt Voucher ID

**Response:**
Returns a download URL for the generated PDF file. The PDF includes:
- Company logo and contact information
- Voucher ID (NO.{voucher_id})
- Date (formatted as yyyy/MM/dd)
- Guest name (under "Received from Mr.M/s")
- Total amount with currency
- Payment method
- Services table with details (Service Name, Adult, Child, Kid, Prices, Total)
- Total amount
- Signature lines (Accountant and Received by with guest name)

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": {
    "en": "PDF file generated successfully",
    "ar": "تم إنشاء ملف PDF بنجاح"
  },
  "data": "http://127.0.0.1:8080/exports/Receipt_Voucher_1_20251205191500.pdf"
}
```

**Error Response (404 Not Found):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": {
    "en": "Receipt voucher not found",
    "ar": "سند القبض غير موجود"
  },
  "error": "Receipt voucher not found"
}
```

**Error Response (400 Bad Request):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": {
    "en": "Invalid receipt voucher ID",
    "ar": "رقم فاتورة الاستلام غير صحيح"
  },
  "error": "Invalid receipt voucher ID"
}
```

**Usage:**
1. Call this endpoint with the voucher ID
2. The response contains a download URL
3. Use the URL to download the PDF file
4. The PDF file is automatically deleted after 5 seconds (cleanup mechanism)

**Example:**
```
GET /api/receipt-vouchers/1/pdf
```

**Notes:**
- PDF files are saved in the `exports` directory
- File naming format: `Receipt_Voucher_{id}_{timestamp}.pdf`
- The PDF matches the preview layout shown in the application
- Voucher ID replaces "NO:0315" in the PDF
- Client name is placed under "Received by"
- All services are included in a detailed table

request.description:
Create a new receipt voucher with services.

**⚠️ Important: What to Send in Request**
Only send **client/guest data** in the request body. Employee-related fields (`employeeAddedId`, `commissionEmployee`) are determined automatically from:
- `accessToken`: Identifies the logged-in employee (who is creating the voucher)
- `isMyClient`: Determines if the client belongs to the current employee or another employee
- Employee data: Commission percentage is retrieved from the employee's profile in the database

**Request Body (Client Data Only):**
```json
{
  "guestName": "Jane Doe",
  "location": "Dubai",
  "locationId": 1,
  "currencyId": 1,
  "phoneNumber": "+971501234568",
  "status": "PENDING",
  "hotel": "Grand Hotel",
  "room": 202,
  "note": "Special request",
  "pickupTime": "03:00 - 03:30",
  "pickupStatus": "YET",
  "driver": "محمد علي",
  "carNumber": 1,
  "payment": "CASH",
  "isMyClient": true,
  "employeeAddedId": null,
  "typeOperation": "SERVICE",
  "employeeIsReceivedCommission": false,
  "discountPercentage": 10,
  "services": [
    {
      "serviceId": 1,
      "adultNumber": 2,
      "childNumber": 1,
      "kidNumber": 0,
      "adultPrice": 200.0,
      "childPrice": 150.0,
      "kidPrice": 100.0
    }
  ],
  "priceBeforePercentage": 1000.0,
  "priceAfterPercentage": 900.0,
  "finalPriceWithCommissionEmployee": 1000.0,
  "finalPriceAfterDeductingCommissionEmployee": 900.0
}
```

**Required Fields:**
- `guestName` (required): Guest/client name
- `typeOperation` (required): Operation type (e.g., "SERVICE")
- `priceBeforePercentage` (required): Price before discount
- `priceAfterPercentage` (required): Price after discount
- `finalPriceWithCommissionEmployee` (required): Final price with commission
- `finalPriceAfterDeductingCommissionEmployee` (required): Final price after deducting commission

**Optional Fields (Client Data):**
- `location`: Location name (text)
- `locationId`: Location ID (references Locations table - used for pricing)
- `currencyId`: Currency ID (default: AED)
- `phoneNumber`: Guest phone number
- `status`: Status - Values: `PENDING`, `ACCEPTED`, `COMPLETED`, `CANCELLED` (default: `PENDING`)
- `hotel`: Hotel name
- `room`: Room number
- `note`: Additional notes
- `pickupTime`: Pickup time as plain text string (e.g., "03:00 - 03:30")
- `pickupStatus`: Pickup status - Values: `YET`, `PICKED`, `DELIVERED`
- `driver`: Driver name
- `carNumber`: Car/vehicle number
- `payment`: Payment method - Values: `CASH`, `CARD`, `PENDING` (default: `PENDING`)
- `isMyClient`: Boolean - `true` if client is yours (current employee), `false` if client belongs to another employee (default: `true`)
- `employeeAddedId`: Employee ID who brought the client (required only if `isMyClient` = `false`)
- `employeeIsReceivedCommission`: Whether employee received commission (default: `false`)
- `discountPercentage`: Discount percentage
- `services`: List of services (see below)

**❌ DO NOT Send (Auto-Determined):**
- `commissionEmployee`: **NOT REQUIRED** - Commission amount is calculated automatically from:
  - Employee's commission percentage (from employee profile: `employee.commission`)
  - Final price of the voucher
  - Formula: `commissionEmployee = (finalPrice × employee.commission) / 100`

**Services Array:**
Each service object contains:
- `serviceId` (required): Service ID
- `adultNumber` (optional): Number of adults (default: 0)
- `childNumber` (optional): Number of children (default: 0)
- `kidNumber` (optional): Number of kids (default: 0)
- `adultPrice` (required): Price per adult
- `childPrice` (required): Price per child
- `kidPrice` (required): Price per kid

**🔐 How Employee & Commission Are Determined:**

1. **From `accessToken`:**
   - System extracts the logged-in employee ID from the JWT token
   - This identifies who is creating the voucher

2. **From `isMyClient`:**
   - **If `isMyClient = true`:**
     - Client belongs to the current logged-in employee
     - `employeeAddedId` is automatically set to the current employee's ID (from token)
     - Commission goes to the current employee
     - Commission percentage is retrieved from current employee's profile (`employee.commission`)
   - **If `isMyClient = false`:**
     - Client belongs to another employee
     - `employeeAddedId` must be provided (ID of the employee who brought the client)
     - Commission goes to the employee specified in `employeeAddedId`
     - Commission percentage is retrieved from that employee's profile

3. **Commission Calculation:**
   - Commission amount = `(finalPriceAfterDeductingCommissionEmployee × employee.commission) / 100`
   - `employee.commission` is the percentage stored in the employee's profile (e.g., 10 = 10%)
   - This is calculated automatically, **you don't need to send it**

**Permissions Required:**
- `addNewReceiptVoucherMe`: Required to create voucher for your own client (`isMyClient = true`)
- `addNewReceiptVoucherOtherEmployee`: Required to create voucher for another employee's client (`isMyClient = false`)

**Success Response (201 Created):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": {
    "en": "Receipt voucher created successfully",
    "ar": "تم إنشاء سند القبض بنجاح"
  },
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "createAt": "2025/12/05 19:15:00",
    "guestName": "Jane Doe",
    "location": "Dubai",
    "locationId": 1,
    "status": "PENDING",
    "hotel": "Grand Hotel",
    "room": 202,
    "payment": "CASH",
    "employeeAddedId": 1,
    "commissionEmployee": 100.0,
    "services": [
      {
        "id": 1,
        "serviceId": 1,
        "serviceName": "60 Minutes QUAD BIKE ONLY",
        "adultNumber": 2,
        "childNumber": 1,
        "kidNumber": 0,
        "adultPrice": 200.0,
        "childPrice": 150.0,
        "kidPrice": 100.0,
        "totalPrice": 550.0
      }
    ],
    "priceBeforePercentage": 1000.0,
    "priceAfterPercentage": 900.0,
    "finalPriceWithCommissionEmployee": 1000.0,
    "finalPriceAfterDeductingCommissionEmployee": 900.0,
    "commissionId": 1,
    "commissionStatus": "PENDING",
    "commissionAmount": 100.0
  }
}
```

**🔄 Automatic Commission Creation:**
When a receipt voucher is created:
1. If `employeeAddedId` is present and `commissionEmployee` > 0, a commission record is automatically created in the `employee_commissions` table
2. The commission is created with status `PENDING`
3. The commission amount equals `commissionEmployee` from the voucher
4. The commission is linked to the voucher via `receiptVoucherId`
5. The response includes commission information:
   - `commissionId`: ID of the created commission record
   - `commissionStatus`: Status of the commission (initially `PENDING`)
   - `commissionAmount`: Commission amount
6. The employee can see their commission status in the voucher response
7. When commission is paid (using `POST /api/commissions/{id}/pay`), the status changes to `PAID`

**Error Response (400 Bad Request - Missing employeeAddedId):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": {
    "en": "employeeAddedId is required when isMyClient is false",
    "ar": "معرف الموظف مطلوب عندما يكون isMyClient false"
  },
  "error": "employeeAddedId is required when isMyClient is false"
}
```

**Error Response (403 Forbidden - Permission Denied):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": {
    "en": "Permission denied",
    "ar": "تم رفض الصلاحية"
  },
  "error": "Permission denied: addNewReceiptVoucherMe or addNewReceiptVoucherOtherEmployee required"
}
```

**Error Response (404 Not Found - Employee Not Found):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": {
    "en": "Employee not found",
    "ar": "الموظف غير موجود"
  },
  "error": "Employee not found"
}
```

**Notes:**
- **Only send client/guest data** - employee and commission data are determined automatically
- Total price per service is calculated as: `(adultNumber × adultPrice) + (childNumber × childPrice) + (kidNumber × kidPrice)`
- `pickupTime` is accepted as plain text string (not timestamp)
- `createAt` is automatically set to current date/time
- `createAt` in response is formatted as `yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm`
- Commission percentage is retrieved from employee profile, not from request
- Commission is automatically created when voucher is created (if employee has commission enabled)
- Commission status starts as `PENDING` and can be changed to `PAID` when payment is made
- Employees can track their commissions through the voucher response or by querying commissions endpoints

Update a receipt voucher by ID. All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated.

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (required): Receipt Voucher ID

**Request Body (All fields are optional):**
- `guestName`: Guest name
- `location`: Location name
- `currencyId`: Currency ID
- `phoneNumber`: Phone number
- `status`: Status - Values: `PENDING`, `ACCEPTED`, `COMPLETED`, `CANCELLED`
- `hotel`: Hotel name
- `room`: Room number
- `note`: Additional notes
- `pickupTime`: Pickup time as plain text string (e.g., "03:00 - 03:30")
- `pickupStatus`: Pickup status - Values: `YET`, `PICKED`, `DELIVERED`
- `driver`: Driver name
- `carNumber`: Car/vehicle number
- `payment`: Payment method - Values: `CASH`, `CARD`, `PENDING`
- `employeeAddedId`: Employee ID who added this voucher
- `commissionEmployee`: Employee commission amount
- `typeOperation`: Operation type
- `employeeIsReceivedCommission`: Whether employee received commission
- `discountPercentage`: Discount percentage
- `priceBeforePercentage`: Price before discount
- `priceAfterPercentage`: Price after discount
- `finalPriceWithCommissionEmployee`: Final price with commission
- `finalPriceAfterDeductingCommissionEmployee`: Final price after deducting commission
- `services`: List of services (see Create Receipt Voucher for structure)

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": {
    "en": "Receipt voucher updated successfully",
    "ar": "تم تحديث سند القبض بنجاح"
  },
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "createAt": "2025/12/05 19:15:00",
    "guestName": "Jane Doe Updated",
    "status": "ACCEPTED",
    "services": [...],
    ...
  }
}
```

**Error Response (404 Not Found):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": {
    "en": "Receipt voucher not found",
    "ar": "سند القبض غير موجود"
  },
  "error": "Receipt voucher not found"
}
```

**🚗 Auto-Sync with Vehicle Groups:**
- **If the voucher has a `pickupGroupId` and you change `carNumber` or `driver`:**
  - ALL bookings and vouchers in the same group will be automatically updated with the new values
  - This ensures consistency across all items assigned to the same vehicle
  - The `pickupGroupId` is preserved during update (not changed)

**Example:**
If voucher #666 is in group "abc-123" with bookings #132 and #555:
- Updating voucher #666's `carNumber` from 1 to 2 → automatically updates bookings #132 and #555's `carNumber` to 2
- Updating voucher #666's `driver` from "محمد" to "أحمد" → automatically updates bookings #132 and #555's `driver` to "أحمد"
- This works from both the vouchers page and pickup page

**Notes:**
- `pickupTime` should be provided as plain text string (not timestamp)
- `createAt` in response is formatted as `yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm`
- Services can be updated by providing a new `services` array

Update receipt voucher status (PENDING, ACCEPTED, COMPLETED, CANCELLED)

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (required): Receipt Voucher ID

**Query Parameters:**
- `status` (required): New status value
  - Values: `PENDING`, `ACCEPTED`, `COMPLETED`, `CANCELLED`

**Permission Required:**
- `editReceiptVoucher` permission

**🔄 Integration with Pickup-Time:**
- When status changes to `ACCEPTED` or `PENDING`, the voucher will automatically appear in `/api/pickup-times` endpoint
- When status changes to `COMPLETED` or `CANCELLED`, the voucher is automatically removed from pickup page
- You can change voucher status from any screen, and it will be reflected in the pickup-time endpoint

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Receipt voucher updated successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "status": "ACCEPTED",
    "guestName": "Jane Doe",
    "services": [
      {
        "id": 1,
        "serviceId": 1,
        "serviceName": "60 Minutes QUAD BIKE ONLY",
        "adultNumber": 2,
        "childNumber": 1,
        "kidNumber": 0,
        "adultPrice": 200.0,
        "childPrice": 150.0,
        "kidPrice": 100.0,
        "totalPrice": 550.0
      }
    ],
    "priceBeforePercentage": 1000.0,
    "priceAfterPercentage": 900.0,
    "finalPriceWithCommissionEmployee": 1000.0,
    "finalPriceAfterDeductingCommissionEmployee": 900.0
  }
}
```

**Error Response (400 Bad Request - Missing Status):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Status is required",
  "error": "Status is required"
}
```

**Error Response (400 Bad Request - Invalid Status):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Invalid status",
  "error": "Invalid status"
}
```

**Error Response (404 Not Found):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Receipt voucher not found",
  "error": "Receipt voucher not found"
}
```

**Error Response (403 Forbidden - Permission Denied):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Permission denied",
  "error": "You don't have permission to update receipt voucher status. Edit receipt voucher permission required."
}
```

**Notes:**
- Only vouchers with `editReceiptVoucher` permission can be updated
- Status values are case-insensitive (will be converted to uppercase)
- When status changes to `ACCEPTED` or `PENDING`, the voucher will appear in pickup-time endpoint
- When status changes to `COMPLETED` or `CANCELLED`, the voucher is automatically removed from pickup page
- Response includes all voucher data with services
- You can change voucher status from any screen, and it will be reflected in the pickup-time endpoint

Update receipt voucher pickup status

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (required): Receipt Voucher ID

**Query Parameters:**
- `status` (required): New pickup status value
  - Values: `YET` (not picked yet), `PICKED` (picked up), `INWAY` (in way)

**Permission Required:**

**🔄 Integration with Pickup-Time:**
- When pickup status changes, the voucher will be updated in `/api/pickup-times` endpoint
- Pickup status changes are reflected immediately in the pickup-time endpoint
- You can change pickup status from any screen, and it will be reflected in the pickup-time endpoint

**Success Response (200):**

```json
      }
    ],

    "priceAfterPercentage": 900.0,
    "finalPriceWithCommissionEmployee": 1000.0,
    "finalPriceAfterDeductingCommissionEmployee": 900.0
  }

```

**Error Response (400 Bad Request - Missing Status):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": "Status is required",
```

**Error Response (403 Forbidden - Permission Denied):**

```json
  "message": "Permission denied",
  "error": "You don't have permission to update pickup status. Edit receipt voucher permission required."
}
```

**Notes:**
- Only vouchers with `editReceiptVoucher` permission can be updated
- Pickup status values are case-insensitive (will be converted to uppercase)
- `YET`: Voucher has not been picked up yet
- `PICKED`: Voucher has been picked up from the hotel/location
- `INWAY`: Voucher is in way to destination
- When pickup status changes, the voucher will be updated in pickup-time endpoint
- Response includes all voucher data with services
- You can change pickup status from any screen, and it will be reflected in the pickup-time endpoint

Delete a receipt voucher by ID (soft delete)

**Path Parameters:**
- `id` (required): Receipt Voucher ID

**Permission Required:**
- `deleteReceiptVoucher` permission

**What gets deleted:**
- Receipt voucher (soft delete - sets deletedAt timestamp)
- All OperationServiceReceiptVouchers associated with the voucher are also deleted

**Success Response (204 No Content):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": {
    "en": "Receipt voucher deleted successfully",
    "ar": "تم حذف سند القبض بنجاح"
  }
}
```

**Error Response (404 Not Found):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "message": {
    "en": "Receipt voucher not found",
    "ar": "سند القبض غير موجود"
  },
  "error": "Receipt voucher not found"
}
```

**Notes:**
- This is a soft delete operation - the voucher is marked as deleted but not permanently removed from the database
- Deleted vouchers will not appear in GET requests (they are filtered by deletedAt IS NULL)
- Associated services (OperationServiceReceiptVouchers) are also deleted
- After deletion, the voucher will be removed from pickup time page automatically

item.name: Service Agents
item.description:
Manage agent-specific services with location-based pricing

**Features:**
- Global services (locationId = null) - same price for all locations
- Location-specific services - different prices per location
- Automatic fallback: if location-specific price not found, uses global price
- Support for adult, child, and kid prices
- Complete seed data for all agents (PEGAS, ABSea/Dubairelax, HOLIDAY MOMENTS, ATSEA TOURS, ANEX TOUR, AL KHALIDIAH TOURISM, Al Sakr / Parus)

**Important:**
- When creating a booking, prices are automatically fetched from ServiceAgent based on agentId, serviceId, and locationId
- If locationId is null in ServiceAgent, it's a global service (same price everywhere)
- If locationId is provided, it's location-specific (only for that location)
- All seed data includes real pricing from agent contracts
- Services are automatically seeded on application startup
- Seed data is loaded automatically: existing services are not deleted, only new ones are added
- ServiceAgents seed includes logging: check console for "ServiceAgents seed completed: Created X, Skipped Y"
- If services are missing, check console for warnings about missing agents or services

query.description: Optional: Filter by location ID. If provided, returns location-specific services + global services. If not provided, returns all services.

request.description:
Get all services for a specific agent (grouped by global and location-specific)

**Path Parameters:**
- `agentId` (required): Agent ID

**Query Parameters:**
- `locationId` (optional): Filter services by location. If provided, returns location-specific services + global services. If not provided, returns all services.

**Examples:**
- `GET /api/agents/1/services` - All services for agent ID 1 (grouped by global/location)
- `GET /api/agents/1/services?locationId=1` - Services for agent 1 filtered by location 1

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Services retrieved successfully",
  "data": {
    "agentId": 1,
    "agentName": "PEGAS",
    "globalServices": [
      {
        "id": 2,
        "agentId": 1,
        "locationId": null,
        "serviceId": 1,
        "serviceName": "60 Minutes QUAD BIKE ONLY",
        "locationName": null,
        "adultPrice": 247.5,
        "childPrice": 209.0,
        "kidPrice": null,
        "isGlobal": true
      }
    ],
    "locationServices": {
      "Dubai": [
        {
          "id": 1,
          "agentId": 1,
          "locationId": 2,
          "serviceId": 7,
          "serviceName": "30 Minutes Camel Ride Trip only",
          "locationName": "Dubai",
          "adultPrice": 250.0,
          "childPrice": 200.0,
          "kidPrice": null,
          "isGlobal": false
        }
      ],
      "Ras Al Khaimah": [
        {
          "id": 3,
          "agentId": 1,
          "locationId": 1,
          "serviceId": 7,
          "serviceName": "30 Minutes Camel Ride Trip only",
          "locationName": "Ras Al Khaimah",
          "adultPrice": 150.0,
          "childPrice": 100.0,
          "kidPrice": null,
          "isGlobal": false
        }
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

**Note:** 
- This endpoint is used when creating a booking. When user selects an agent, this endpoint shows all available services with their prices based on location.
- Services are automatically grouped into `globalServices` (locationId = null) and `locationServices` (grouped by location name)
- All agents have complete seed data with real pricing from contracts

Create a global service for an agent (same price for all locations)

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "agentId": 1,
  "locationId": null,
  "serviceId": 1,
  "adultPrice": 250.0,
  "childPrice": 200.0,
  "kidPrice": null
}
```

**Fields:**
- `agentId` (required): Agent ID (can also be provided in URL path)
- `locationId` (optional): Location ID. If `null`, service is global (same price everywhere)
- `serviceId` (required): Service ID
- `adultPrice` (required): Price for adults
- `childPrice` (optional): Price for children (4-11 years)
- `kidPrice` (optional): Price for kids (under 4 years)

**Success Response (201):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Service created successfully",
  "data": {
    "id": 1,
    "agentId": 1,
    "locationId": null,
    "serviceId": 1,
    "serviceName": "60 Minutes QUAD BIKE ONLY",
    "locationName": null,
    "adultPrice": 250.0,
    "childPrice": 200.0,
    "kidPrice": null,
    "isGlobal": true
  }
}
```

**Error Response (409):**
```json
{
  "success": false,
  "error": "ServiceAgent conflict: Service already exists for this agent and location",
  "message": "Email already exists: Service already exists for this agent and location"
}
```

Create a location-specific service for an agent (different price for specific location)

**Request Body:**
```json
{
  "agentId": 1,
  "locationId": 1,
  "serviceId": 1,
  "adultPrice": 225.0,
  "childPrice": 190.0,
  "kidPrice": null
}
```

**Note:**
- If `locationId` is provided, this service will have a specific price for that location
- You can create the same service with different prices for different locations
- When creating a booking, if location-specific price exists, it will be used. Otherwise, global price will be used.

**Example:**
- Global: `60 Minutes QUAD BIKE ONLY` = 250 AED (all locations)
- Dubai: `60 Minutes QUAD BIKE ONLY` = 225 AED (only for Dubai)
- Sharjah: `60 Minutes QUAD BIKE ONLY` = 200 AED (only for Sharjah)

When booking from Dubai, price will be 225 AED (location-specific).
When booking from Abu Dhabi (no location-specific price), price will be 250 AED (global).

Update a service agent

**Request Body (all fields optional):**
```json
{
  "agentId": 1,
  "locationId": 1,
  "serviceId": 1,
  "adultPrice": 230.0,
  "childPrice": 195.0,
  "kidPrice": null
}
```

**Note:**
- Set `locationId` to `null` to convert location-specific service to global
- Set `locationId` to a value to convert global service to location-specific
- All other fields are optional

Delete a service agent

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Service agent deleted successfully"
}
```

Get all locations without pagination (for dropdowns/selects)

**Use Case:**
- Use this endpoint to populate dropdown menus or select lists
- Returns all locations in a single response (no pagination)

**Success Response (200):**
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Locations retrieved successfully",
  "data": [
    {
      "id": 1,
      "name": "Dubai",
      "emirate": "Dubai"
    },
    {
      "id": 2,
      "name": "Sharjah",
      "emirate": "Sharjah"
    }
  ]
}
```

**Note:** This endpoint does not include pagination info. Use `/api/locations` for paginated results.

request.description:
Get all pending pickups (bookings and vouchers) - supports both grouped and unified list views

**Features:**
- Returns bookings and vouchers with `status = ACCEPTED` or `status = PENDING`
- **IMPORTANT: Only items with services are returned** - Items with empty `services: []` are automatically filtered out
- When status changes to `COMPLETED`, items are automatically removed from pickup page
- Returns pickups in multiple formats:
  - `vehicleGroups`: Items grouped by `pickupGroupId` (assigned to vehicles) - only items with services
  - `unassigned`: Items without `pickupGroupId` (not yet assigned) - only items with services
  - `allItems`: Unified flat list of ALL items (bookings and vouchers together) with `type` key - only items with services
- Each vehicle assignment is separate, even if same carNumber is used
- Each item includes complete information: guest name, phone, payment, status, services, room, agent, location, hotel
- You can select any items from `allItems` (check `type` field) and assign them to a driver together
- **Filtering:** Items without services are automatically excluded from the response

```json
        }

          "type": "voucher",

          "payment": "CASH",
          "status": "PENDING",
          "pickupStatus": null,
          "pickupTime": null,
          "services": [
            {
              "id": 1,
              "serviceId": 1,
              "serviceName": "60 Minutes QUAD BIKE ONLY",

              "childNumber": 1,
              "kidNumber": 0,

              "childPrice": 150.0,

          "pickupGroupId": null
        }
      }
    ]
```
